previous_headings: What is the National Broadband Map (NBM) data set?
title: National Broadband Map (NBM)
text: NBM started FCC November 20221 following Form 477. Behind National Broadband Map two datasets (see @fig-broadbanddata, ). using “Broadband Availability” dataset derived “Fabric” locations dataset (developed CostQuest). locations determined within Fabric locations data. dataset can derived multiple ways: States Providers. States Data can split summaries “raw data”. summaries available geographies technologies: Fixed Broadband Mobile Broadband. every states need access raw data technologies. works focused Fixed Broadband Availability Data. , NBM provides information scale “service” - location covered provider technology specifics maximum speeds. one big change versus Form 477: moving scale Census block scale location (See @sec-BSL definition). Every location characterized : providing services (frn, provider_id, brand_name) description services (technology, max_advertised_download_speed, max_advertised_upload_speed, low_latency) Whether location associated residential, business ways localize (state_abbr, block_geoid, h3_res8_id) ingestion kept h3_res8_id added date release timestamp provided filename (see data-raw/NBM.R get every details). exact coordinates every locations part Fabric dataset within Broadband Availability can link record location Census Block (2020 vintage) H3 hexagon.

previous_headings: What is the National Broadband Map (NBM) data set? > A Quick Introduction
what: What is a Broadband Service Location (BSL)?
title: National Broadband Map (NBM)
text: broadband serviceable location defined “business residential location United States fixed broadband Internet access service , can , installed.” residential BSL includes residential structures, including structures (contain) housing units group quarters (terms defined United States Census Bureau). business BSL includes “non-residential (business, government, non-profit, etc.) structures property without residential locations expect demand Internet access service.” (source FCC2)

previous_headings: What is the National Broadband Map (NBM) data set? > A Quick Introduction
title: National Broadband Map (NBM)
text: NBM two big releases per year (June December) versions every two weeks take account challenges3. Experience told us sometimes release can faster (one per week) slower. FCC (April 2024) provides changelog releases versions (documentation major changes4).

title: FCC's Form 477
text: Simplifying access data usually matters opinion: data kept, discarded? effectif data analysis important communicate decisions provide data’s story.

title: FCC's Form 477
text: FCC reporting Form 477 Fixed Broadband deployement. Broadband providers required fill : facilities-based broadband providers required file data FCC twice year (Form 477) offer Internet access service speeds exceeding 200 kbps least one direction.Fixed providers file lists census blocks can offer service least one location, additional information service. Source: https://www.fcc.gov/general/broadband-deployment-data-fcc-form-477 census block mentioned US census blocks 2010 vintage. Water census blocks also removed. Every row dataset matching specific services provided ISP census block. Hence ISP can provides multiple services, example different technologies different speeds census block. time period covered goes December 2014 update June December every next year december 2021.

title: FCC's Form 477
text: Broadband data FCC Form 477, data U.S. Census Bureau presented site offered free subject copyright restriction. FCC asking proper credit given: Source data: FCC Form 477 using data please follow simple guidelines. Source: https://broadband477map.fcc.gov/#/

title: FCC's Form 477
text: 477 data released multiple versions releases. took decision use ingest last release version. assuming versions consistant selecting last one help homogeneize dataset. also decided satellite data less important hence focused Fixed without satellite data. see data dictionary kept opinionated version maybe supbotimal perhaps need look implementation making sure process reliable. providing code used generated data set .

title: FCC's Form 477
text: may notice strict data types. example FRN 10 numbers (padded 0), ie CHAR(10) sadly experience previous ingestions shown rules enforced. decided provide data instead removing rows dubious value. decisions done analyst domain expert , future revisit decisions enforce constraints data.
